results.content:
I bought this course based on the title. 

It has nothing to do with either 'jenkins' or 'mastery'. 

Basically: 
- one is taught how to use Virtual Box to create a "very simple" (this isn't even automated) 
- It has nothing to do with the workings of Jenkins
- No reference to pipeline.
- In fact, only two jobs are shown - and they are senseless hello world jobs.
- the "mastering the Certified Jenkins Engineer exam" is simply a link to the already publicly available cje-study-guide-2017.pdf

Massively disappointed. I had high hopes for this but will be requesting a refund now - 15mins after buying. What a waste of time :-(

results.content:
I signed up for this course after taking an introductory DevOps course. That greatly helped! 
This is a great course as it not only covered DevOps but Jenkins. The pace is steady and the instructor is very detailed oriented. Sometimes, I had to fast forward, but I guess for beginners - this would be great!
Excellent instruction and all hands-on is what I liked the most - so it covered both theory and application.

Overall, I would highly recommend this course. Thank you.
